code: import axios from"axios";export const getFollowingNumber=async spaceId=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(spaceId===''){return false;}else{const response=await axios.get("https://api-mumul.site/getFollow/followingNumber/".concat(spaceId),{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Accept:'application/json',Authorization:'Bearer '+token}});if(response.status!==200){throw new Error('bad server condition');}return response.data;}}catch(e){console.error('getFollowingNumber Error: ',e.message);return false;}};
